{{Location Intro|The '''Emerald Maple Inn'''|description=<p>{{If Self|Emerald Maple Inn|It|The Emerald Maple Inn}} is an inn located west of the [[Statue of The Seven]], and it overlooks [[Luhua Pool]]. Due to its relatively remote location, its proprietor, [[Mr. Zhu]], struggles to get patrons.</p><p>[[Mona]] used to frequent the inn before she moved to [[Mondstadt]], due to the inn's cheap prices.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Astrology and the 50-Year Pact}}</ref></p>}}
